extension.author: Vince Wooll

extension.description: Allows you to set a specific task as a module that can be included anywhere on the site. Minicomponents have a pattern jnnnnnxxxxx.class.php. Some of these have the pattern 06000, for example like j06000popular_properties.class.php (see the popular properties plugin). This functionality can be called via a url like http://www.domain.com/index.php?option=com_jomres&task=popular_properties, however it is more appropriate to include that popular properties page in a module, and this module allows you to do that. To put the popular properties plugin in a module, set the 'task' parameter opposite to 'popular_properties' and configure your position as you would any other module.

field.name: jomres_task
field.label: Task
field.description: The Jomres task to be called.

field.name: arguments
field.label: Optional arguments
field.description: Optional arguments, for example for 'remoteavailability' you would set this to '&id=1' assuming that your property uid is 1
